column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Lan - Thanks for your review. I'm very glad to hear that you enjoyed your tapas dish and Spicy Miso Tonkotsu. I hope you visit us again and sample other toppings
column2: be sure to ask your server what he or she might recommend since they've tried just about everything on the menu! Thank you again for your kind words and we look forward to serving you again soon!
